1.content: First off, which team would you like to follow?
1.title: Choose your team

111.content: Ruby pushes open the door to her dorm with a tired sigh, "I hate finals week." she grumbles. She goes to climb onto her bunk when something on her desk catches her eye.
111.title: Ruby

choices: "Do you have any more cookies?" (She's clueless AND hungry)
"Do you think I've gained weight?" (She's aware of her weight)
"What was in those cookies?" (She's already caught on to Weiss. Crap.)
1111.content:
"EEEEEEEE!!!" Ruby screamed at the top of her lungs. It was a good thing she was the first one back to Team RWBY's dorm, or else WBY might've lost some eardrums.

Using her semblance to cross the immeasurable distance of three feet, she finally made it to her destination. On her desk sat a plate of still-warm cookies, perfectly preserved on a plate and covered in saran wrap. Ruby lifted the plate up, nothing that it, too, was warm. She was about to tear into them, when she noted the card sitting next to the spot the plate was. Inscribed on it in beautiful handwriting were three words and a single letter:

"Made with love,

W-"

Ruby's face warmed slightly at reading this. Weiss had made her cookies. Weiss had made Ruby cookies. Ruby face got a little redder. Her and Weiss had been going back and forth with awkward hand touches and flirtatious glances for months. The crushes the had on each other were painfully obvious to everyone but themselves, and when asked about having anyone they liked, they always either shoot down the question or laugh nervously and stare at the floor. Even their other two teammates, Blake and Yang, couldn't get them to see the obvious (even though they, too, were in a very similar situation). However, this... this is the first time Weiss had gotten her ANYTHING. It was probably the first time she'd gotten ANYONE anything. If Yang were in the room, she would've said something about how Ruby had just "melted the Ice Queen's heart and stole it at the same time." God damnit, Yang, why'd you have to ruin the moment.

Finishing her subconscious conversation with her sister, which is a very normal, sane thing to do, she eyed the discoidal treasures sitting in her hand and the card from her crush.

"Made with love" Ruby read.

Love.

Ruby shook the thought from her mind and turned her attention back to the cookies. 'They'll get cold if I don't eat 'em soon,' she thought.

"Well, I can't let them go to waste," she said to no one in particular. She tore the plastic wrapping of the circular delicacies, causing the delightful smell to invade Ruby's senses. She picked one up and investigated it, taking in everything about it, the smell, the texture, the warmth, and, of course, the flavor: chocolate chip, her favorite.

"Ok, what was that Yang keeps saying? BOLO? GOLO? Ah, whatever, they can't be THAT bad." Cautiously, she brings the cookie up to her lips and takes a nibble.

It was one of the best cookies she'd ever eaten.

Ruby quickly devoured the rest of the cookie, savoring everything about it, the warmth, the spices, the... well... EVERYTHING.

"OH. MU. GWORD!" Ruby said through a mouthful of cookie. "DISH ISH AMASINSH!!! Not even bothering to swallow fully, Ruby grabbed another cookie and consumed it, this time taking in the richness of the chocolate. She wouldn't be surprised if Weiss had hand-picked this chocolate, it was to die for! She swiftly grabbed another and inhaled it, this time noting how it was somehow warm from being fresh from the oven, while still being slightly crispy; it was to perfect time for a cookie to be eaten. This went on for several minutes, Ruby quickly cramming cookies down her gullet, while also taking time to savor every crumb that was prepared for her. Various noises could be heard coming from Ruby, chewing and munching, moans and groans, all of completely drowning out the sound of the dorm door opening slightly, a pale figure peeking through. A smile graced the Schnee's face as she removed herself from the room.

As Weiss walked back to the dormitory kitchen, a blush crept onto her face, not just from the heat in the kitchen, but from seeing Ruby enjoy her creation... as well what would be happening to her soon. It was no surprise to some in from her home, like Winter and Klein, that Weiss had a taste for women; larger women. Winter would always note when a plump businesswoman would grace the Schnee family with their presence, Weiss would always be glancing at their flowing middles, or staring at swaying behinds as they took their leave. Weiss knew this, and tried to keep it down, knowing that her father would disapprove of her preference in gender. However, meeting Ruby, she had found one person she could confide in, one who wouldn't see her as a Schnee, one she could trust, one she could love.

She just happened to be one who was ripe to have a fuller figure.

Weiss had witnessed her partner's outlandish eating habits for a year and a half, and, even still, wouldn't gain a single pound. There had been one time after the year's end ball that she had put on a good ten pounds or so, making her corset slightly tighter and her skirt not cover up all of her rear (both of which Weiss took note of... and pictures), but by the time their break had ended, she had shed the pounds, returning her to her slim self. She cursed herself for not taking advantage of the situation then, but, this time, she would ensure that her pounds would stay on.

Weiss returned to the kitchen, the smell of baked goods in the air. Coming to her station, she found everything the way she had left it, completely in order. 'The only thing missing...' Weiss thought as she reached a hand into her pocket, 'Is the secret ingredient.' Many people would say that the secret ingredient in their cookies is love, though, as she had made it clear in her note, that was no secret, a fact that she regretted slightly, but which faded soon after she saw her crush consuming the cookies with gusto.

Weiss gathered her apron, gathered her measurement apparatus', and got to work on her second batch. She made sure everything was perfect, the measurements, the consistency, how much to mix it, but just as she was about to start forming the cookies themselves, she added some of her secret ingredient. Then a little more. Then more. Then more still. Until, finally, she had run out.

"I can assure you, Ruby Rose, that you will love these cookies, as well as the pounds they give you." Weiss spoke quietly, as she stirred the compound into the dough, then started forming the balls of dough. She set all two dozen of them in the oven at exactly the right temperature, and set it for exactly the right amount of time.

"I'll be back for you later" Weiss said, as she strode of to check on Ruby's "progress". She walked along with a slight bounce in her step, a rare sight from the Schnee heiress. As she came up to the dorm door, she noted that she couldn't hear Ruby's eating anymore. 'She must be done already,' Weiss thought. 'No surprise there.' With a smirk on her face, she turned to doorknob and let herself in. What she saw surprised her: Ruby was sitting at her desk, happily licking her fingers of any residue of cookie that remained. What startled her, though, was Ruby's size. Her stomach had grown out slightly, putting a bit of strain on her corset. Someone that saw her might think that it was a food baby, but Weiss knew better. Weiss knew that that little ball was all of fat. Eyeing up the rest of her partner, Weiss noted that Ruby's thighs were slightly thicker, her usual stockings thinner and more stretched out due to holding more thigh. Glancing up, she saw that Ruby's breast had grown ever so slightly. She was never too gifted in the boob category, those genes went to Yang, but she might at least have Blake beat out. 'I think Ruby's gonna be a pear, though.' Weiss thought, seeing how Ruby's middle and lower half took most of the weight.

After she had finished licking all ten of her fingers TWICE, Ruby finally noticed Weiss had walked in and gets up to walk over to her.

"Hello, Weiss." Ruby said with a blush.

"Hi, Ruby" Weiss responds, a blush dusting her face as well. Ruby's next words surprise the heiress...
1111.title: "Made with love"... and little something else

choices: Weiss and Ruby arrive to the kitchen without issue, Ruby digs in to the cookies.
They arrive, but Blake and Yang have arrived and had a few already.
11111.content:
"So I saw your cookies," came the words of the fuller figured girl, a small blush lighting up her cheeks. Weiss too gained a fuller blush as she realized that Ruby had picked up on her meaning behind the note.

"W-well, I'm glad you like the cookies..." Weiss knew she couldn't just let Ruby knew she was interested, in typical weiss fashion, she knew she had to play hard to get.

"Cookies?" Came Ruby's adorable retort before realization came to her. "Ah yes! Cookies!" Lightly patting her fatter stomach, she seemingly lost herself in a daze. "They were delicious." Unconsciously rubbing her stomach, she almost seemed to forget that Weiss was in the room as a small line of drool leaked out of her mouth at the mere memory of the cookies she'd just ingested.

Enthralled by her potential girlfriend losing herself to the memory of her confections, Weiss quickly coughed into her hands, awakening Ruby from her daze. "Ah, yes. I'm glad you enjoyed them. They were an old Schnee family recipe you know, plenty of love put into every bite.

Making sure to insinuate every syllable of 'bite' she could feel Ruby's blush from where she was standing, as the red hair tipped huntress picked up on Weiss' meaning.

'Oh she's so adorable,' were the thoughts on Weiss' mind as she couldn't help but imagine Ruby with an added 100 pounds or so. Not enough to force her to give up on her huntress dreams, but certainly enough where she could be the ideal girl for her. Images of the two of them, laying in bed together, with Weiss feeling her large lover fatty confection after fatty confection. Her soft pale unblemished skin perfect for kneading and warming her on those cold nights.

Weiss would make sure to take care of her lover whenever she was home, or at the very least having the latest technology available to pamper her. She imagined Ruby struggling to get on her clothes, from those cute white panties with the cute corgi print, the sheer thought of those being stretched wide, Ruby unaware that she'd outgrown them 80 lbs ago; to her skirt which would occasionally have a small rip in them, only for Weiss to quickly replace or repair the garment, making sure Ruby never knew her weight. Her shirt would often times lose a button or two, but a quick lie to the younger girl would hopefully placate her, and maybe a larger version of the garment worn would keep her from finding out about her added weight.

Late at night, Weiss would sometimes dream about Ruby growing so large that her clothes would all burst off of her, her fat having been too much for them. Each button bursting on her shirt, each thread tearing on her skirt, and her bra and panties tearing off in a show of embarrassment would sometimes have Weiss waking up late at night realizing she had to change her sheets.

"-iss! WEISS!"

Suddenly thrown out of her daydream, she hasn't realized that Ruby had been talking to her for the past minute or so. Quickly catching herself, she answered her now pudgy partner.

"I'm sorry, I got lost in the moment. You were saying?"

Giving a shrug at her partner's response, Ruby got right back on track. Grasping her partners hand, she hugged it, unknowingly bringing it close to her stomach and sinking it into her new fat.

"I was wondering if you had more of those cookies! They were some of the best things I'd ever tasted!" Ruby's straight to the point demeanor was something Weiss appreciated. Why beat around the bush when you could be up front about what you wanted. However, Weiss knew such sentiment was ironic with her current desires of fattening up her partner.

Putting on her best 'warm friend' smile, she addressed Ruby.

"As it just so happens, I have a new batch ready in the oven right now. Much larger than the one you just had, they should be ready soon, so if you want you can get them right when they come out of the over.

Getting a slight squeee from the younger girl, Weiss saw her team leader hopping up and down in place, unknowingly shaking her newly added fat a bit. Licking her lips a bit at the sight, she turned from Ruby so that the girl wouldn't see her face.

"A-anyway, let's go. I can tell you're hungry for them, so why waste the time!"

Marching out of the room, Ruby soon followed, with no notice of her new pudge.

112.content:
Weiss Schnee was once again busy at her work. Unlike her teammates she wasn't one to laze about on her days off. No she bettered herself by studying, training, or working on dust experiments such as this one. She had been pondering over it for some time and still couldn't think of what ingredients would be needed to stabilize the currently erratic mixture of dust.

Holding the flask up to eye level Weiss frowned as the purple liquid dust seemed to glow and spark.

"Hmmm, not quite right yet."

If she could get this to work Weiss may have discovered a way to increase food supply by several times. In layman's terms she was trying to create a dust that when applied to something would increase its size and proportions. Hoping to test it soon she just had to make sure it was safe before anything happened.

As she was about to add another agent to the flask Weiss was unfortunately interrupted by.
112.title: Weiss

1121.content:
"Hi Weis can't stop now gonna be late!" Ruby blurted out as she swung the door open and sped into the room using her semblance. Unfortunately while Ruby could move super fast she wasn't the greatest at dodging resulting in her careening into Weiss like a rose petal trailing cannonball. Weiss's shocked outcry was a moment too late as the two girls fell to the floor with a painful thud.

Ready to give Ruby the verbal scolding of a life time Weiss's face went more pale than it usually was as she watched the flask filled with her experimental dust fall from the air right towards her and Ruby.

Thinking quickly the heiress pushed her friend out of harms way only for the flask to tip over as it fell landing squarely with its open end right in her mouth. Gravity brought the liquid dust flowing into Weiss who was forced to swallow it down or risk choking.

"Glug Glug Glurk!" Eyes Wide Weiss spat the empty flask out and groaned as Ruby helped her to her feet.

"Omigosh Weiss are you ok? Please tell me you're okay I'm so sorry what was that?" The young leader was babbling her words as fast as she usually ran.

"Ruby calm down", Weiss groaned, "I'm fine for now just.....ugh!"

Weiss bent over double as a weird feeling filled her body.
1121.title: Clutzy Dolt Ruby

But she would soon notice something that confused her, Weiss' faces was turning a different color from her head down. "Uh...Weiss, you're looking a little a bit sick, are you ok? You know aside from..." Weiss looked at Ruby will a scared look, "What do you mean?"

Ruby ask stepping closer. "I can feel something sloshing inside of me. I...I don't..." Before she could finish her sentence, her swelling grew stronger and faster. Her combat skirt had finally given up and ripped off her swelling body, her arms and legs swelled and sank into her body, and her boots slipped off. She continued to swell, rounding out and becoming more and more helpless. After what seemed like hours, when in reality it was only 5 minutes, she finally stopped. "Oh thank god, it stopped." Weiss said sounding very relieved. "That's great and all, but we still don't know exactly what happened to you." Ruby said, giving Weiss a light poke. "Well, my estimate is that the mixture caused my body to rapidly produce some sort of fluid and turn my skin pale. But I'm still concerned as to why my body became round like this." Ruby was going to throw her guess out, but was interrupted by the sound of a low yet loud gurgling. "Oh no, what now?"

"Thanks, but I'd rather have jerky." replied Yang. Blake looked a little crestfallen. "But, hey, since you made them!" Yang took one and bit into it. The chocolate was the sweetest she had ever tasted, the powdered sugar adding to the sweet taste. Yang ate it slowly, but couldn't resist eating another. However, as she reached for a third, she began feeling...

"I didn't mean you any harm... you're so cute, I wanted to see you cuter with some more pudge." replied the faunus. 1142.content:
A small pack of gum was sitting by itself on top of a weight-lifting machine; strangely enough, there was nothing around it that could have belonged to the person who had left it there.
"Hello?" Yang asked the empty air, looking around the gym for anyone. "Does this gum belong to anyone?" Nothing; the gym was empty, although the blonde could hear the sound of water coming from the gym showers. She had the room pretty much to herself.
"Well, if there's nobody around..." Yang said to herself, picking up the pack of gum and opening it. Huh; instead of multiple piece, there was just one large stick of gum within the package. She shrugged. "Eh, what the hell. It's gum; nobody's gonna miss it." She took out a piece, then popped it into her mouth and chewed on it. Not bad; tasted like blueberries.

Suddenly...
1142.title: Blueberry gum

choices: Someone hears her and comes running
Nobody is around, she is on her own
11422.content:
Suddenly a burst of blueberry juice filled her mouth causing her to stumble a bit. She keeps chewing as she enters the locker room to go take a shower. As she peels off her sweaty gym gear, her lips turn a deep shade of purple before slowly spreading. She grabs her towel and special shampoo and heads to an open stall.

‘Wow, this gum is still pretty juicy.’ She thinks as she swallows another mouthful of juice and turns on the shower. The blue shade quickly overtakes her normal skin tone as she washes her hair, closing her eyes in pleasure a she massages her scalp. The juice starts pooling under her skin as she chews. Yang, being the ever well-endowed girl she is, starts to swell at the chest. With every chew, her boobs swell, filling with juice.

She moans lightly as her boobs stretch becoming extra sensitive. The rest of her body swelled at a much slower rate. Her belly poached out and her hips, ass, and thighs thickened. But her chest is the star of the show, swelling up to HH-cups in the span of a few minutes. Juice leaked from her nipples, running down the curve of her body down into the drain.

She reaches down to grab her body wash and catches sight of her blue skin and lets out a scream.
11422.title: Getting juicy

11423.content:
Yang's stomach suddenly let out a loud, grumbling roar of displeasure as loud as any Ursa, demanding to be fed. The firebrand winced and clutched her grumbling midsection; she had eaten lunch less than two hours ago, but now she was starving all of a sudden! Screw the workout - she needed to get something in her stomach, and quick.

Still clutching her stomach in pain, Yang sat down on a weightlifting bench and mulled over her choices.
She could always head to the cafeteria again and try to get some more food, but there was always the possibility that they had closed up for the day. Second, she could head back to her team's dorm; the blonde brawler had a fairly sizable supply of snacks stashed away in the room, and she knew for a fact that Ruby did as well. If worst came to worst, she could always ask her sister for some extra treats if her current stash didn't turn out to be enough.

And finally, a little voice had begun to speak up within Yang's mind - a voice that was surprisingly persuasive. And right now, that little voice was urging her to head into the showers; somehow, that might be able to satisfy her hunger as well...
11423.title: Nothing at first, but she suddenly feels... {i}...

114232.content:
After a few minutes of pondering, Yang stood back up and headed to the showers with an exasperated grunt. Snacks wouldn't be enough to sate her complaining belly, she could tell, and the cafeteria was probably closed, anyway. Right now, the best chance she had for filling her belly was listening to the voice that had just piped up within her head.

Without noticing, the blonde brawler quieted her footsteps as she entered the girls' showers, moving at a slower, more deliberate pace as if she were stalking Grimm, and her tongue unconsciously peeked out to wet her lips as she moved. One small part of Yang's mind was growing hesitant about this option - what on earth was she doing, and why was she acting like a predator on the hunt? - but the rest of her paid that portion no heed, her golden-maned head turning from side to side as she scanned the area.

There were three other people in the shower rooms at the moment; the water was running in a nearby shower stall, with the silhouette of a girl visible behind the door, and she could hear two people making out in another stall further in the back. Yes, these would do nicely, but which one to go to first?
114232.title: Follow the little voice's lead

122.content:
Nora walked down the halls of Beacon, humming to herself. She was looking forward to sparring between JNPR and RWBY later. As she exited the hallway, she entered the cafeteria. She saw three plates, one full of cookies, one with a stick of blue gum and one with a water bottle. Nora noted she was a little hungry...

Which one does she take?
122.title: Nora

choices: No mercy, Ren wakes her a 6:00 am
Mercy, Ren lets her sleep in
1221.content:
Nora grabs the plate of cookies as she walks through the cafeteria and started munching away. Just as she was about to exit, a poster caught her eye.

“That’s tomorrow!” She screamed in both glee and horror before racing down the hallway to her dorm. “REN!”

She burst into the room and proceed to tackle the boy. Ren looked at Nora with mild amusement while Pyrrha and Jaune were recovering from her sudden entrance. “Yes, Nora?”

“Ren, tomorrow is national pancake day!” Nora exclaimed. “We almost missed it.” Jaune and Pyrrha looked completely bewildered as Ren turned back to his homework.

“Is that all?” Ren replied, not letting Nora see his smirk.

“Ren, this is the most important day of the year.” She whined as she shoveled cookies into her mouth.

“I know you like pancakes, but the most important day of the year.” Pyrrha asked, clearly confused. Nora completely ignore her as she continued whining.

“Nora, I didn’t forget.” He said with a grin.

She stared at him for a moment. “Meanie.” She pouted, still chowing down on the cookies.

He gave her a flat stare before booping her nose. She broke out in a smile. “You’re the best.”

“I am assuming you are going to try and break your record.” He asked already knowing the answer.

“What record?” Jaune asked now sitting next to Pyrrha.

“My pancake eating record!” She replied with a fire in her eyes.

“Your pancake eating record, Nora that seems incredibly unhealthy.” Pyrrha said awkwardly.

“No, it isn’t silly.”

“That is a lot of calories, Nora.”

“So,” She said without a care in the world, popping another cookie in her mouth.

“Aren’t you worried about getting fat?”

“Nope,”

The two looked at each other confused. “Nora, the human metabolism can only handle so much.”

“The amount of butt kicking, smashing and running around we do, none of it will stick and if it does it will burn right off.” She hummed. “Plus, I look good with a food baby.”

The two shared a look before looking back at the pancake loving ginger as she patted her belly.

“Whatever you say Nora.”

She just smiled before grabbing Ren’s sleeve, “To the store!’ As she starts dragging him out the door.

“Nora.”

“Yes, Ren.”

“We are already well stocked for tomorrow.”

“Oh,” She hums as she chomps another cookie as they come to a stop halfway down the hall. “Ren?” She said quietly.

“Yes, Nora?”

“Do you think I can beat my record this year?”

“It will take some doing but we can do it. I have fate in you and your stomach.” He says poking her in the middle. She giggles a little.

“It is settled then, I will not fail like the last three years! I will be victorious! And Ren, I want you to show no mercy, give me no quarter, do what it takes even if you have to force me!” She roars her might declaration of war on breakfast.

He rolls his eyes and gives her a mock salute. “Understood.” He says as the two returns to the room. He plucks the mostly eaten plate of cookies from her grasps.

“Hey.”

“No more food for the rest of the day.”

She looks hurt for a moment but she dons a determined smile. “No mercy already?”

He just smiles. “We need as empty and hungry as possible so go get your workout clothes on.” She nods before jetting out to her clothes.

“You two might want to make a day trip into town tomorrow.” He says looking at his other two teammates.

“You two are weird.” ”You shouldn’t indulge her like that.”

“It makes her happy.” He said with a shrug as he hands the cookies to Jaune before turning to his closet. “Plus, she is right about looking good with a food baby.”

The two go wide eyed at the statement before turning to each other as Pyrrha grabs a cookie from the plate.
1221.title: Of cookies and planning

123.content:
Pyrrha relaxed on the rooftop of Beacon. It was still early in the day and the morning sun glinted off of her armor and weapons. She liked to come up here during what little spare time she had and look out over Vale and everyone rushing about below her. In some ways it reminded her of her life, held above everyone else alone and secluded by social barriers brought about by her own fame and success.

Still, things could be worse. She had wonderful new friends at Beacon, an awesome team, and a dorky partner that was so lovably kind and determined but also so annoying oblivious when it came to her feelings. How he couldn't notice her affections made her sometimes want to shake him silly and......

Like she had thought earlier, it could be worse. So Pyrrha sat contently until a noise interrupted her quiet moment.

"Thanks." said Pyrrha. "You want to..."

Cinder let out an evil laugh as she plotted in her dorm room in Beacon. She had found the perfect plan to take over and ruin the school. It was foolproof, crafty and most of all, unexpected and unlikely to be predicted by her foes.

choices: Cinder starts to lose her nerve
15313.content:
She'd destroy her enemy's mobility. If they couldn't move or were at least slowed down, taking over the school would be a breeze. With a dark grin, she whipped out her scroll and failed a number she would normally dread.it rang once, twice before the screen lite up.

"Hey cuty. I am kinda in the middle of something." The figure that popped up on the screen said with a grin, as something moans off screen. Cinder rolls her eyes.

"I need you to come to beacon." Cinder said flatly. The person on the other end pouted.

"Like I said Cyn, I am a little busy. And as much as I would love to have some fun with you, I am guessing you aren't calling because you want to hook." She said as she places the scroll down so she is still on screen. Another moan drifts through the room. "Oh, don't thinks I forgot about you sweetie." She says as she picks up a pitcher from off screen and starts pouring it into the end of a beer funnel.

"Ginger, I want you to help me neutralizes some threats, in the way only you can." The woman on the other end paused.

"Really, I thought you found my methods distasteful." She said as she finished emptying the contains of the pitcher into the funnel.

"I find you overly flirtatious advances at me distasteful." She replied calmly. "I could care less at how you direct you powers at others."

"But Cyn, I can't help it. You are so damn sexy with those dark smiles and subtle pouts. Plus that body of yours has so much potential." She says with a pick of her lips. "Don't you want to be a beauty like her." Ginger grins as she turns the scroll camera to face the other occupant in the room. She is a massively obese blond with a funnel gag strapped on her face. "Two months and she is already immobile." She turned the camera back and brought it close to her face before whispering. "And I wasn't even trying."

"I want you to try here." She said as that dark smile of her's bloomed.

"I am busy with my assignment from the mistress here." Ginger said as she played with a strand of her burnt auburn hair.

"One date per victim reaching immobility." Cinder countered causing Ginger to perk up.

"Oh Cyn, you can sweeten the pot better than that. One date a week for as long as it takes, and I don't go full out on you or your lacks. Deal?"

Cinder thought for a moment. "Be subtle but no stalling and you have a deal."

Ginger squealed in delight." Oh we are going to have so much fun." She turns to her current victim with a dark smile. "We going to have one last huray before I dump you on a buyer, cutie."

She ends the call that a grin. She may have made a deal with the devil but then again, it wasn't the first time.

info.brief_description: Fatten up or inflate your favorite guys or gals from RWBY
info.description:
Choose your favorite characters from Rooster Teeth's RWBY and expand them in whatever way you'd like(Weight gain, air inflation, fruit, etc). Just please keep in mind these rules

1. Keep the grammar and spelling good,
2. Do not make shoddy, short chapters like this :"ruby ate a bunch of food and gained 1000000 ponds"
3. No sex or gore.
4. Do not kill off characters. Which also means no fatal popping(Popping but staying alive might be alright I guess)
5. AUs/Deviations from canon is fine, as is making plots based around the current canon. Just keep in mind some people may not be up to date on the show.

Allowed kinks/fetishes

Fat
Weight gain
Stuffing
Force Feeding
Air inflation
Water inflation
Blueberry/Fruit inflation
